about.paragraph: Since 2006, we have been serving dentists and patients across Turkey. In 2019, we launched the Uni Implant project with high European standards, built on 6 years of production experience and continuous development.

aboutUsMainPage.title: About Us
aboutUsMainPage.historyParagraph: Since 2006, we have been serving dentists and patients across Turkey. In 2019, we launched the Uni Implant project with high European standards, built on 6 years of production experience and continuous development.

vision.title: Our Vision & Mission
vision.paragraph: "Life is Beautiful When You Smile" We aim to bring innovative designs and advanced dental implant technologies to the global market — focusing on quality, comfort, and human-centered care.

list.item3: Trusted, safe, and precise medical products

list.item1: Consistent quality across all production stages
list.item3: Ongoing updates with the latest technology
list.item4: Multi-stage quality control for maximum reliability

conference.title: Scientific Conference
conference.paragraph: Uni Implant recently hosted a scientific conference attended by leading dentists to exchange ideas and explore the latest in dental implant innovations.

catalogMainPage.title: Products Catalog
catalogMainPage.paragraph1: You can obtain detailed information about our company and products by reviewing our catalog.
catalogMainPage.paragraph2: All our product varieties and specifications are available in our catalog

usefulInfo.intro: Dental implants offer a durable and aesthetic solution for missing teeth. They integrate with the jawbone for a permanent fit and can support restorations for a natural-looking smile. Additionally, they enhance functionality by allowing normal speech and chewing, and when placed by a qualified dentist, they have a high success rate.

durability.title: Durability
durability.desc: Dental implants are made from strong, biocompatible materials like titanium, designed to fuse with the jawbone and provide long-lasting, permanent support.

aesthetics.title: Aesthetics
aesthetics.desc: Dental implants are oral health products used to support dental prosthetics like crowns, bridges, and dentures, which can be customized to match the color and shape of a patient's natural teeth.

functionality.title: Functionality
functionality.desc: Dental implants can assist patients in regaining their natural speaking and chewing abilities, ultimately enhancing their overall quality of life and contributing positively to their self-confidence.

safety.title: Safety
safety.desc: It has been demonstrated that the products manufactured by Uni-Implant are safe and effective with a high success rate when used by a qualified and experienced dentist.

aboutCompany.title: About Company
aboutCompany.paragraph: Committed to a quality approach in the dental sector since 2006, we have been serving our distinguished dentists with various titles and patients from almost all parts of Turkey, which has been levelled up by 6 years of producing experience, and Uni Implant Project was brought into action with high standards within unique quality.

discovery.title: Discover the Innovative Solutions from Uni Implant Dental Implant Systems
discovery.paragraph: Join us as we showcase the cutting-edge products and services offered by Uni Dental Implant Systems. Our commitment to excellence and innovative approach sets us apart in the industry. From Implant Systems, to Prosthetic Solutions, our team is dedicated to providing unparalleled quality and customer satisfaction. Watch now to see how Uni Implant Dental Implant Systems is leading the way in Dental.

whyUs.title: Why Uni-Implant Systems ?
whyUs.p1: As Uni Implant family, we have been working hard to provide our customers with the best products as we deeply believe that every patient has the right to get the highest quality under our innovative R&D studies in accordance with the European standards.
whyUs.p2: Uni Implant is known to have quality, sensitive and creative products in disposable medical device sector.
whyUs.p3: We are doing our best to meet our customers’ needs and expectations, to raise the standards of our patients and dentists with all our energy, ambition, determination, and experience ensuring absolute customer satisfaction.
